wikipedia_page.main: Richard Uren (26 February 1926 – 30 May 2010) was a rugby union player who played for Waterloo R.F.C. and represented the England national rugby union team four times. He represented Cheshire at both rugby union and golf and was also a successful racing sailor.

link_mentions.page: List of England national rugby union players

response: * Dick Uren – England international rugby union player.
